Starbucks Rewards members, redeem your one-for-one treat voucher and take home this Blackboard Starbucks Card. Valid from noon on 13 Feb to 17 Feb. Available on all drinks, all sizes, while stocks last.

comments.message: Hello Starbuck Singapore! Would like to say i really love my visits to Hougang Mall Starbucks branch! Always well greeted by the staffs here, who often go the extra mile to make an effort to know their customers by name and also casually asking how's my day been! Stayed in Sengkang but always visit the Hougang Mall branch because of the great customer service!! :)

Hey Starbucks I sent in an enquiry regarding my drink rewards. I should have accumulated two but when I went to redeem my free drink it was shown I only had one.

I sent in am enquiry, but it's been 4 days and no response.

Bought at hougang mall branch today a tall Dark chocolate frap and grande Java chip frap and decided to use the free drink to offset. The staff keyed in 2 Grande size and when I told her about it she said I'd have paid the same Grande size price anyway since it will offset the lower drink. I'm disappointed that I get a free drink that's cheapest of all the things I buy. So much for being your gold member.

I have 90 stars on the new system but no rewards available for redemption. I went to buy a drink on Tuesday and the cashier at the store told me to send an email on this issue as she was unable to do anything from her end. I've sent an email but have not received a response. I've also sent a PM on Facebook on Tuesday and another two PMs on Wednesday and have not gotten any response. All I keep getting are spam mails from Starbucks on how to obtain additional stars (double stars, top up and get stars). Why do I need so many stars when I'm not getting any rewards for them or getting any help anywhere on resolving the issue?
Hi, my card balance is missing some amount. Can please help to correct this?

Despite of having 130 stars, I was told by your staff(Jet) at Pacific Plaza that I am not eligible for any free drink/food even if it is clearly stated on the rewards list. I think even your staff are still confused with how the new reward system works. I can redeem in other outlets though.

I'm not buying anything from you guys again until you apologise to your countrymen in the States for putting foreigners in front of your own people in need, your veterans. The Koran says that we must take care of our families first. Get your values and priorities right.

The current rewards are so sad, not encouraging at all as it's so hard to earn points.
In USA it's 2 stars per $1, and more importantly they get a free drink on their birthday (even the lowest tier) which really makes members feel remembered and valued by the company.
In Singapore? Just give you free size upgrade only lol just sad.

Never ever buy any salad from Starbucks! Ate one Caesar chicken salad last week(yeah still upset about it now) which tasted as delicious as leather! The chicken meat was stale and tough. Luckily there were only a meager 3 or 4 cubes! And a few miserable pieces of veg! As someone whose tongue is as sharp as dunno what, I believe they have kept it for a few days. Definitely not worth the $8/$9. Who goes to Starbucks for salad anyway? If not for the gift card, Starbucks is a no from me. Salad to takeaway? Cold storage/Ntuc finest!

The current rewards are so sad,  not encouraging at all as it's so hard to earn points. In USA it's 2 stars per $1, and more importantly they get a free drink on their birthday (even the lowest tier) which really makes members feel remembered and valued by the company. In Singapore?  Just give you free size upgrade only lol just sad.
Be prepared not being able to log in to your accounts when the new scheme goes live
Yay will you guys be making it more difficult to get rewards now?

Maybe they will change the design of the Gold card, following the US and Canada new design...
I love Starbucks
Stay tuned, all will be released on 18 Jan.
